Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>Hey Dex, I'll comment more in a bit, but yeah Quicktime works better 
>for me at least...I have no idea why...but I can't get DivX to work, 
>even though you probably didn't do anything wrong.
>
>ken

I tried the DivX player version 2.5.4 (which is bundled with the 5.x 
codecs) and all was fine here. All I can think is that there is some 
update you require from windowsupdate.microsoft.com, it's possible you 
need the latest version of DirectX.

Colin.
